recipe.title: Apple Pie Bake Recipe by Tasty

steps.step: Cut the cinnamon roll dough into 3 even strips, then cut those strip in 3 pieces, making 9 pieces total per cinnamon roll. Set aside the icing.
In a medium bowl, combine eggs, milk, cinnamon, and extract, stirring until smooth. Set aside.
In a pan over medium-high heat, combine butter, apples, and brown sugar, cooking until sugar starts to caramelize, about 10 minutes. Remove from heat.
Sprinkle the cinnamon roll dough pieces evenly in a 9×9in (23 x 23cm) baking tray. Pour the egg mixture on top, followed by the apples. Drizzle the reserved icing on top.
Bake for 25–30 minutes, until golden brown. Serve with ice cream!

steps_updated.steps_updated: Cut the cinnamon roll dough into 3 even strips, then cut those strip in 3 pieces, making 9 pieces total per cinnamon roll.
In a medium bowl, combine eggs, milk, cinnamon, and extract, stirring until smooth.
In a pan over medium-high heat, combine butter, apples, and brown sugar, cooking until sugar starts to caramelize, about 10 minutes.
Sprinkle the cinnamon roll dough pieces evenly in a 9×9in (23 x 23cm) baking tray.
Pour the egg mixture on top, followed by the apples.
Drizzle the reserved icing on top.
Bake for 25–30 minutes, until golden brown.
